page.title: 10The Podimore Inn
page.content: My Mum and Dad work hard in the pub but really enjoy it.My job is to collect the dirty plates and glasses. All sorts of people drop in;local {villagers,farmers,joggers,}folk from the{Base}and{visitors}to the{Museum. The inside of the pub is really spacious with a huge{fireplace}at the end of the room.High up over the{bar we have a shelf on which we display models of aeroplanes. Outside we have a{children's play {area}with an enormous model boot for them to clamber about in. It has steps inside and a slide at the back of it. We put on many{special events.}For instance we recently held a{fancy {dress rugby match}which was very funny. Then we organise{bar-B-ques}and every summer the{Morris Dancers}come for an evening to entertain the customers. STUART REEVES.
